Class Comic

java.lang.Object
Comic
public class Comic extends Object
Holds information about a comic.

  • Constructor Details

    • Comic

      public Comic(String title, String author, String imagePath, int id, int rating, int currentChapter, int totalChapters, boolean completed, boolean pinned)
      Makes a Comic object.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of comic.
      author - Author of comic.
      imagePath - URL of image to be used for comic.
      id - ID of comic.
      rating - Rating for comic out of 10.
      currentChapter - Current chapter of comic user is reading.
      totalChapters - Total chapters in comic.
      completed - Whether comic is completed or not.
      pinned - Whether comic is at top of list.
